snippet: Hal Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ managing general partner, did radio interviews on WFAN and ESPN on Tuesday, speaking about the luxury-tax threshold and the status of negotiations with Joe Girardi and Robinson Cano.
abstract: Hal Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ managing general partner, did radio interviews on WFAN and ESPN on Tuesday, speaking about the luxury-tax threshold and the status of negotiations with Joe Girardi and Robinson Cano.

headline.main: Steinbrenner, With His Team's Season Over, Talks About 2014
